subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees bashed home runs on their way to victories all season, but after Game 1 of the A.L. division series against Baltimore, the question arises whether the long ball will be enough.
snippet: The Yankees bashed home runs on their way to victories all season, but after Game 1 of the A.L. division series against Baltimore, the question arises whether the long ball will be enough.
